SEARCH
Package tempest_foundation.ClassElements

Class ClassDetails

java.lang.Object
tempest_foundation.SubmissionElements.MarkSnippet
tempest_foundation.ClassElements.ClassDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassE
public class ClassDetails extends MarkSnippet
The ClassDetails class represents a detailed structure of a class in a program. It extends MarkSnippet and contains information such as the class name, variables, functions, and class content. It also provides methods for manipulation and grading of class components.
Author:
Jared De Four, Ch√© Salazar
